phases.title: Phase 3 - L1 Prototype
phases.description: Now were cooking with gas. This phase is about taking all our R&D and making a 3D printer.

phases.title: Phase 2 - Aluminum Scale Up
phases.description: Ok, we can play with acoustics, now lets test something useful. This phase is centered on using what we learned in phase 1 to control aluminum. Secondarily, this phase is about testing and refining auxiliary systems.

phases.title: Phase 1 - Fundamental R&D
phases.description: Dipping our toes in the water. This phase is about getting all team members familiar with their domain, identifying key problems, and testing our fundamental  control mechanisms.

projects.name: Liquid Metal Control
projects.description: Using acoustics to manage position and shape of gallium-indium

projects.name: Acoustic Characterization & Styrofoam Testing
projects.description: Analyzing machine geometry, control principles, and transducer capacity with styrafoam

projects.name: Liquid-Solid Aluminum Bonding
projects.description: Deriving optimal solutions for machine material bonding
